comments: Took Fernandopulle in City Tech for Microbiology (summer semester) he was SO arrogant. He spent more time talking about himself than he did teaching. His tests were confusing and often had little to do with what he focused on in class. Only perk is that he writes awesome letters of recommendation for grad school.

You learn more about his private life than actual course material. He admits to teaching at several schools, never uses a textbook, confuses classes. His notes are constantly being corrected due to his error. Leaves students very confused. Tests require advanced knowledge of course materials. Very tempermental.
he was very unorganized he has perference to certain people and he makes very racial comments. cuny should kick him out
funny guy! sometimes he doesn\'t know what he is doing but then later he puts himself together. always complaining about his life in a funny way. his exams are very easy.
